gramGrp.pos:
VB
or
PASSIVE VB
with
‘in’
or
‘on’

sense.def:
To engage in an activity
pomeni lotiti se neke dejavnosti.
To be engaged in an activity
pomeni opravljati neko dejavnost.

seg.quote: It was considered inappropriate for a former President to engage in commerce.
The work we're engaged on is a study of heat transfer.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
engages someone
ali
engages someone's attention or interest
, privlači človekovo zanimanje in razmišljanje.

seg.quote: Boredom has a chance to develop if the child's interest is not engaged.

sense.def:
To engage someone in conversation
pomeni pogovarjati se z nekom.

To engage someone to do a particular job
pomeni najeti nekoga, da opravi določeno delo.
